title: division_area
description:
Division areas are polygons that represent the land or maritime area covered by a division.
Each division area belongs to a division which it references by ID, and for which the division area provides an area polygon. For ease of use, every division area repeats the subtype, names, country, and region properties of the division it belongs to.

geometry.description: Division area geometries MUST be polygons or multi-polygons as defined by the GeoJSON schema.

division_id.description: Division ID of the division this area belongs to.

country.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code of the division this area belongs to.

region.description: ISO 3166-2 principal subdivision code of the division this area belongs to.
